description: This file defines the NoteDatabase class, a singleton utility for performing CRUD operations on notes using the sqflite package in a Flutter project. It manages database initialization, schema creation, and provides methods for getting all notes, inserting, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NoteDatabase
classes.description: Singleton class providing CRUD operations for notes stored in an SQLite database using sqflite.

methods.name: _initDb
methods.description: Initializes the database by setting its path and creating the schema.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Getter that provides access to the database instance, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: _onCreate
methods.description: Callback executed during database creation to define the 'notes' table schema.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Retrieves all notes from the database as a list of Note objects.

methods.name: insertNote
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database, removing its id before insertion.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its id.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database by its id.
